Html:
I have two instances of an identical .NET 4.0 ListView control, both populated with the same ItemsSource. On one tabpage, the control displays beautifully.

On the other page, the control is clearly populated, but no text appears. I know that it is populated because I can double-click in the middle of the list which sets an isChecked flag in the selecteditem to true.

This has to be a bug -- has anyone seen this?  I tried placing the listview in a stackpanel and a grid to see if that made a difference.
